widget.name: Recent Posts
widget.preload: if globals[:recent_posts_last_update].blank? || globals[:recent_posts_last_update] < Roxiware::Blog.last_update globals[:recent_posts] = [] Roxiware::Blog::Post.published().order("post_date DESC").limit(locals[:recent_posts_count]).each do |post| if(locals[:excerpt_length] > 0) globals[:recent_posts] << {:post=>post, :snippet=>raw(post.snippet(locals[:excerpt_length], :sanitizer=>Roxiware::Sanitizer::EXTENDED_SANITIZER){""}) else globals[:recent_posts] << {:post=>post, :snippet=>post.post_content} end end globals[:recent_posts_last_update] = Roxiware::Blog.last_update end locals[:recent_posts] = globals[:recent_posts] locals[:recent_posts].present?
widget.render_view: <% recent_posts.each do |post_data| post = post_data[:post] %> <%= content_tag(:div, :class=>"recent_post_entry") do Roxiware::Blog::PostHelper.post_header(post, :header_format=>header_format, :date_format=>date_format, :show_comments=>true) + content_tag(:div, post_data[:snippet].html_safe, :class=>"post_snippet") + link_to("", post.post_link, :class=>"post_more") end %> <% end %>
